code: import apiUrl from'../apiConfig';import axios from'axios';export var signUp=function signUp(credentials){return axios({method:'POST',url:apiUrl+'/sign-up/',data:{credentials:{email:credentials.email,password:credentials.password,password_confirmation:credentials.passwordConfirmation}}});};export var signIn=function signIn(credentials){return axios({url:apiUrl+'/sign-in/',method:'POST',data:{credentials:{email:credentials.email,password:credentials.password}}});};export var signOut=function signOut(user){return axios({url:apiUrl+'/sign-out/',method:'DELETE',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var changePassword=function changePassword(passwords,user){return axios({url:apiUrl+'/change-pw/',method:'PATCH',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)},data:{passwords:{old:passwords.oldPassword,new:passwords.newPassword}}});};
